name: Mom's Raisin Pie
author: In Memory of Ella I. Schlosser

ingredients.name: Pie shells, for top and bottom

instructions: Cover raisins with water and sugar. Bring to boil until raisins plump. Mix cornstarch with water to make a paste. Add to boiling mixture and boil until thick. Pour in pie shell and bake until done, 400Â° for 20 to 30 minutes.
